verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Savior, my heart is Thine, Keep it for me; May ev'ry thought of mine Glorify Thee. Glorify Thee, Glorify Thee; May ev'ry thought of mine Glorify Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Savior, my will is Thine, Keep it for me; May ev'ry act of mine Be done for Thee. Be done for Thee, Be done for Thee; May ev'ry act of mine Be done for Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Savior, my life is Thine, Keep it for me; May ev'ry hour of mine Be lived for Thee. Be lived for Thee, Be lived for Thee; May every hour of mine Be lived for Thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Savior, my all is Thine, Keep it for me; May all I have, O Lord, Be used for Thee. Be used for Thee, Be used for Thee; May all I have, O Lord, Be used for Thee.
